body_text: Yeah. I've tried to do things like this a few times, and I haven't really found anything I like more for this situation. If we had a fully separate app, including auth, I'd just make a request at startup and cache it, but that isn't the case here.

body_html: Yeah. I've tried to do things like this a few times, and I haven't really found anything I like more for this situation. If we had a fully separate app, including auth, I'd just make a request at startup and cache it, but that isn't the case here.
